titles.title: My Praise Will Never Be Enough

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
My praise will never be enough
My worship is more than just a song
You love me more than I deserve
More than I deserve

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I’ll praise you till the end of days
I’ll praise you
I’ll sing and shout your name
You love me more than I deserve
More than I deserve

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ope mi koito
Ojojumo ni wo ma dupe
Eje ka yin Olorun logo
Yin olorun logo
Seni ma dupe

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I dey wonder why you love me so
Tell me why why you never let me go
Still you love me more than I deserve
More than I deserve

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Your word is written in my heart
Your song is flowing from my mouth
And I'll praise you no matter what they say
I'll praise you everyday
